title: Fighting Blind
description: Kei Valancia is a feisty young werewolf and a master fighter. She has travelled to places and trained weak packs to fight rogue attacks. Now, she’s in the Red Moon Pack to help them prepare for the war looming on their borders. A girl and a newcomer, her arrival is met with raised eyebrows.Ryker Dare, the alpha king, has lived for many years, seen many wars, and spilled blood with his own hands. Although battle-tested and experienced in life, he is yet to meet his mate. Upon knowing of the attacks on his neighboring packs, he takes the opportunity to help them ward off their enemies.Lo and behold, he meets Kei Valancia. Kei finally meets the person that challenges her every move, and Ryker learns a new No. What starts off as a bad first impression turns into a journey full of surprises as the two of them get closer.And with a war just around the corner, they have no one else to trust but each other. But that trust can only go so far as Kei has some secrets that nobody knows. How will Kei’s secrets affect her newfound connection with the dangerous alpha? And Will Ryker finally enjoy life as he has long awaited or will luck finally run out for him?
author: E.    Marie
